text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've found yourself a good team—your wins are proof of that. I'll 
be watching what you do next.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
When will my appetite be sated? You're the one person who knows 
that best.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It'll be the day I beat you.

Back when I first met Narita Brian, several months before her 
astonishing win in the Satsuki Sho…
Her running was, in a word, restrained.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Good run, you two! Keep it up! You'll be ready for the next race in no 
time!

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: You should be running too…

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: You should be running too…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
There's some things you can't get just by running! What that is 
exactly… I couldn't tell you!

Uhh, okay then. Anyway, that's enough training for today. Good job, 
everyone.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoo-hoo! Time to eat! Later, alligator!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: See you tomorrow… Huh? Who's that over there?
I follow Winning Ticket's gaze and find a racer training tirelessly.
Exhale…
Hup!
choice_data_list: She moves flexibly, with powerful strides.

text_block_list.text: It's not bad running at first glance, but something isn't quite in sync.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's Hayahide's little sister, Narita Brian.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: Hayahide's sister?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but why's she out here training alone? Shouldn't she be with 
the rest of her team?
Her team… So she's debuted already?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she's run five races, I think, with two wins so far. It's not bad, 
but I get the feeling it could be better.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: After all, Hayahide told me she's a huge heap of talent.
A heap of talent, huh?

The analytical Biwa Hayahide, a heap of talent in her own right, 
would praise her sister that much?

Hearing that alone would've peaked my interest, but who would've 
thought I'd see Narita Brian run here of all places?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
There's some major athletes at these tryouts. I've really gotta think 
things through before scouting anyone.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Hm? Narita Brian's up next, but didn't she debut already?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I heard she dropped out of her team. Things weren't working out with 
her trainer.

Tryouts are where racers who don't have a team yet try to be scouted 
by a trainer.
(So she quit her team and was training on her own. But why?)
(So she quit her team and was training on her own. But why?)
While I'm still pondering that, Brian's race begins.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Narita Brian finishes five lengths behind first! Did she lose all her 
energy before the last sprint?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
With two Twinkle Series wins under her belt, it's hard to believe her 
result today!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That was a great run! I'd love to have you on our team!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! I'd love to join!

Seeing the other trainers speak with the racers who just finished, I 
follow suit and approach one of the runners.

Seeing the other trainers speak with the racers who just finished, I 
follow suit and approach one of the runners.
Hey, Narita Brian. Mind if we talk?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I don't think I did anything today worthy of being scouted.

She's right—she didn't display much of a performance and lost speed 
near the end.

Yet I can't help but think that uneasy running form of hers is to blame. 
And I have to know if I'm right.
Your flexibility and momentum were good. Perfect form as well.
Your flexibility and momentum were good. Perfect form as well.
But I think those two things aren't fitting together well somehow.
Your form's too perfect. It's holding back your power.
Your form's too perfect. It's holding back your power.
You should try letting your strength guide you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Let my strength guide me…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hup!
Whatever I was expecting, it wasn't this.
Her stance is so low, she looks like an animal on the hunt.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-what's up with that run?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Wow… She going even faster!
Haha… She really is a heap of talent.
Haha… She really is a heap of talent.
If you ran like that in the race, you would've placed first for sure.
If you ran like that in the race, you would've placed first for sure.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I still have to think about it too much. Once I get the hang of it, I'll be 
even faster.
Even faster than that… You're really something.
Even faster than that… You're really something.
choice_data_list:
So, hey, why'd you leave your last team? Your 
trainer must've been proud that you racked up 
two wins.

text_block_list.text:
So, hey, why'd you leave your last team? Your trainer must've been 
proud that you racked up two wins.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Because I want to run more.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: More?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Apparently I don't get consistent results because I don't know how to 
keep my composure.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So they said I needed to take a break from racing.
Composure, huh…

She must not have a good handle on her excitement when she's 
competing.

It's important to be hyped up, but a racer also needs to keep cool 
when making critical, split-second decisions.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: But I didn't accept that explanation or their decision.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I understand why my trainer made that call, but I simply disagree. Nothing more, nothing less.

Wanting to run is as simple as it gets. Though she's certainly 
strong-willed to leave her team over that.
And she has the ability to turn that passion into raw physical power!

If we started now, we could still make the Kyoto Junior Stakes. 
There's the G1 Asahi Hai Futurity Stakes too.
choice_data_list:
If we started now, we could still make the Kyoto 
Junior Stakes. There's the G1 Asahi Hai Futurity 
Stakes too.

text_block_list.text:
Rather than hold back your desire to run, I think it'd be better for you 
to jump right into more races. So…
choice_data_list:
Rather than hold back your desire to run, I think 
it'd be better for you to jump right into more 
races. So…
Would you like to race on my team?

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: Would you like to race on my team?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Oh right, today's the big scouting day. My run after the race was all I 
could think about—I completely forgot.
Let's try out that new running style in the next race!

こうして、チームシリウスの新しいメンバーとし て 
ナリタブライアンが加わることになり——
すぐに彼女の底知れぬ"才能"を目撃することとな る。
